docTitle.titlePart:
Lupamin
®
9095 High Molecular Weight
Linear Polyvinylamine

front.div:
Description The non-toxic monomer, vinylformamide, is polymerized
and then hydrolyzed to form Lupamin 9095, a linear high
molecular weight polyvinylamine that is a colorless to
yellow water solution. It is greater than 90% hydrolyzed.

Applications Polyvinylamine is only commercially available from BASF.
Lupamin is the highest molecular weight commercially
available, linear, cationic polymer. It is pH sensitive with a
cationic charge as high as 19 meq/g polymer. On a
cellulose surface the Zeta Potential varies from –10 to 90
mV. Lupamin can be used in waste treatment, particularly
when it is combined with polyacrylamide. It can increase
the solids in the waste. Other applications are adhesives,
packaging, personal care, textiles and corrosion inhibition.
Lupamin is a registered trademark of BASF Aktiengesellschaft.
